ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: learned to give feedback, receive feedback, and synthesize my work to present it best to those who have no knowledge of the topic
I learned how to plan writing assignments effectively!
We learned strategies for how best to complete the senior project including research and citation methods and tips for completing each stage of the required assignments.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: strengths: strong sense of community, honesty and kindness in feedback, students had a say in activities, course adapted to our needs
Great course, i loved the pacing. I think it could be improved with more of a focus on the instructor showing us how she does things instead of focusing on peer feedback.

This course was very helpful because of the reliance on peer feedback and group work. It allowed us to share our work at each step and get feedback to improve. Seeing how others' projects developed was also great because it was motivating and eye-opening to other research and style methods.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Yes. Its a great way to make the senior thesis more manageable.

Yes, this helped me in my senior project immensely. It helped make me think about my project from an audience perspective and understand what elements could improve it. Being in the class also meant I always had the assignments done before the senior project deadlines which was incredibly helpful.
